comments.en:
Please use the new version 0.4.1 of this driver, version 0.3 is obsolete.

For more convenience in using the Lexmark 3200 this driver is treated together with the "lxm3200c" driver. Please go to the page of the "lxm3200c" driver to get configuration files for your printer. They will than make use of all the "lxm3200" drivers.
